This revision supersedes the previous IRM 4.4.11, Entity Changes, issued 06/01/2007.
This IRM section is for use by employees in Large Business and International (LB&I) and Small Business/ (SB/SE).
Table of Contents
Changes
) Purpose: This section provides general instructions and guidelines for changes. Scope and (
) Audience: The audience for this IRM section will be Examination Case Processing (CCP). (
) AIMS Policy Owner: The Director, SB/SE Technology Solutions, who is the Director, Operations Support. (
) AIMS Program Owner: Exam Systems and Projects, Customer Service. (

) The procedures, which were in this IRM, pertained to the Examination process. The procedures do not pertain to the AIMS IT system, which is title of this IRM. IRM references are given in the Material Changes, for the cedures previously located in this IRM. Centralized Case Processing Procedures, remaining in this IRM, will be included in the new IRM
